mapper.insert: insert into sailtotmdb.CartItems (user_id, quantity, created_date, num_iid, properties, properties_name) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{quantity}, #{created_time}, #{num_iid}, #{properties}, #{propertiesName});
mapper.select: select h.cart_id as cart_id, h.num_iid as num_iid, h.created_date as created_date, p.pic_url as pic_url, p.promotion_price as promotion_price, p.price as price, p.title as title, h.quantity as quantity, h.properties as properties, h.properties_name as propertiesName from sailtotmdb.CartItems h, sailtotmdb.OneBoundApiTaobaoProduct p where h.user_id = #{user_id} and h.num_iid = p.num_iid order by h.created_date desc

select h.cart_id as cart_id, h.num_iid as num_iid, h.created_date as created_date, p.pic_url as pic_url, p.promotion_price as promotion_price, p.price as price, p.title as title, h.quantity as quantity, h.properties as properties, h.properties_name as propertiesName from sailtotmdb.CartItems h, sailtotmdb.OneBoundApiTaobaoProduct p where h.user_id = #{user_id} and h.num_iid = p.num_iid and p.title LIKE #{q} order by h.created_date desc

select h.cart_id as cart_id, h.num_iid as num_iid, h.created_date as created_date, p.pic_url as pic_url, p.promotion_price as promotion_price, p.price as price, p.title as title, h.quantity as quantity, h.properties as properties, h.properties_name as propertiesName from sailtotmdb.CartItems h, sailtotmdb.OneBoundApiTaobaoProduct p where h.user_id = #{userId} and h.num_iid = #{numIid} and properties_name = #{propertiesName} order by h.created_date desc limit 1
